attributes.action: prevent the legislation from proceeding that will stop the use and sale of carbon fibre goods in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been brought to my attention that the environmental lobbyists are petitioning for legislation to prevent the use and sale of carbon fibre goods in non essential circumstances. This would have a detrimental effect on the sports industry, affecting cyclists, racket sports, motorsport fans, especially F1, motorcyclists, and the sailing fraternity.

We are in the middle of a financial crisis, why is it that Politicians and pressure groups do not look at the bigger picture and see the financial benefit that Carbon fibre brings to the UK economy?

We request the that this legislation is not brought in banning the use and sale of carbon fibre for these purposes.
